pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS that can play MP3 files
  • Processor: Any Processor that supports playing MP3 format.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: You don't have to own a video adaptor to listen OST
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
